featured.text: But after strike four, Sullivan became 23 death and took precautions during lightning strikes.
Roy Sullivan, a park ranger in the United States, was struck by lightning more recorded times than any other human being.
Over the course of an 80-year life span, the odds of being hit by lightning are 1 in 3,000, 21 the probability of being struck seven different times.
Over his 36-year career, Sullivan was struck by lightning seven times—and 22 each shock!
Best I can figure is that I have some chemical, some mineral, in my body that draws lightning.

definition.zh_def: 閃電：在雷暴中產生的強烈電流，通常伴隨著雷聲。
definition.en_def: Lightning: A sudden electrostatic discharge during a storm, often accompanied by thunder.
definition.example: The lightning illuminated the night sky.
